text: Eric Bana AM (born Eric BanadinoviÄ‡ on 9 August 1968) is an Australian actor. He was a comedian for a long time, and he was in a show called The Comedy Company. He then became a serious actor in the movie Chopper which is a biopic of criminal Chopper Read. His careerstarted with the sketch series Full Frontal. He became known for his role in the comedy drama The Castle (1997). Bana also acted in the movies Troy and Hulk. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:Australian comedians Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian television actors Category:Australian voice actors Category:Actors from Melbourne Category:Stand-up comedians Category:Television producers Category:Television writers Category:1968 births Category:Living people
title: Eric Bana
